rows.label: tlk45320651_10_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmmmmm... This job really doesn't
seem suited to my skills...

rows.label: tlk45320651_10_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently, it's become necessary to
dramatically increase the pace of our
mineralogy and forestry studies.

rows.label: tlk45320651_10_msg0004
rows.name:
What that means right now is, we need
to collect the latest data from our field
researchers with the utmost urgency.

rows.label: tlk45320651_10_msg0005
rows.name:
The problem is, I'm an Operations
Testing worker, not a communications
specialist or messenger boy.

rows.label: tlk45320651_10_msg0006
rows.name:
It seems quite illogical that I should be
assigned to a task of this nature...

rows.label: tlk45320651_10_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh, would you? That would be most
helpful. I'm sure it was just a clerical
error that I was assigned to this, really.

rows.label: tlk45320651_10_msg0009
rows.name:
But with you on the case, I feel safe
in the knowledge that the task will be
handled efficiently. Good luck!
